full_summary:
================================

**Underground Water and Sewer Materials - Standing Offer Invitation**

**Reference Number:** WS4534804840-Doc4534952720
--------------------------------

**Procurement Details:**

* Solicitation Number: WS4534804840
* Publication Date: April 12, 2024
* Closing Date: April 30, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
* Amendment Date: April 15, 2024

**Scope of Work:**

The successful bidder will supply and deliver underground water and sewer components, including but not limited to, ductile and cast iron, valves and hydrants, and municipal casting, as listed in the most current Ontario edition of the Allpriser Blue Book for Watermain and Sewer Products, on an as-and-when-requested basis to the Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Borden. The standing offer period will be one year with the option to extend for an additional one-year period.

**Standing Offer Invitation Method:**

This Standing Offer Invitation is a competitive tendering process, with bids being evaluated on the basis of satisfactory delivery and compliance with the terms and conditions outlined in the RFP document. The lowest price bid will be awarded the Standing Offer.

**Notice Information:**

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Tender Description: [ view attached RFP document ]
* Contact Information:
	+ Cheng, Sabrina (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ sabrina.cheng@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Government of Canada Terms and Conditions:**

Please refer to the attached RFP document for further information regarding the contract terms and conditions, including but not limited to, payment, delivery, and cancellation policies.

**Note:**

* This standing offer is a one-year agreement with the option to extend for an additional one-year period.
* The offeror will be required to provide all necessary documentation and complete all necessary paperwork to facilitate the transfer of funds.
* All bid submissions and supporting documentation must be submitted in writing by the stated closing time of April 30, 2024, 2:00 PM EST.

**Key Dates:**

* April 12, 2024: Publication Date
* April 15, 2024: Amendment Date
* April 30, 2024, 2:00 PM EST: Closing Date

**Procurement Category:**

This procurement falls under the category of Goods and Services, Category III: Construction and Maintenance. A
